description: This Perl script tests database operations such as create, insert, update, delete, and select using DBI and DBD::SQLite modules. It creates an in-memory SQLite database, performs various SQL commands, and outputs the results to verify correct functionality.

methods.name: execute_sql
methods.description: Prepares and executes an SQL statement on the provided database handle.

methods.name: select_all
methods.description: Performs a 'SELECT *' query on a specified table and prints all rows.
